multiple_choice.question: What type of teeth does a crocodile have?
What happened to my front teeth?

fill_in_the_blanks.question: A cow has strong teeth for grinding food

meanings.sharp: having an edge or point that is able to cut or pierce something
meanings.grind: reduce something to small particles or powder by crushing it
meanings.front: the side or part of an object that is normally seen first
meanings.long: measuring a great distance from end to end
